name: Void Shooter
description:
Defend yourself from invading aliens. However, as the are hidden, you need to reveal them by shooting your cannon.

Control:

A - move left

D - move right

Left Click - shoot

As part of Devday RPLGDC Game Jam submission.

Team Member:
